use-custom-format-clock.description: Use a custom time format in panel
use-custom-format-clock.tooltip: Check this to define a custom format for the time and date in the panel clock.

format-button.description: Show information on date format syntax
format-button.tooltip: Click this button to know more about the syntax for date formats.

capitalize-clock.description: Capitalize the formatted time in panel
capitalize-clock.tooltip: Check this to capitalize the first letter of the formatted time in the panel clock.

show-week-numbers.tooltip: Check this to show week numbers in the calendar.

use-custom-format-calendar.description: Use a custom date format in calendar
use-custom-format-calendar.tooltip: Check this to define a custom format for the time and date in the calendar window.

custom-format-calendar.tooltip: Set your custom date format here.

capitalize-calendar.description: Capitalize the formatted date in calendar
capitalize-calendar.tooltip: Check this to capitalize the first letter of the formatted date in calendar.

use-custom-format-tooltip.description: Use a custom date and time format in clock tooltip
use-custom-format-tooltip.tooltip: Check this to define a custom format for the time and date in the clock tooltip.

capitalize-tooltip.description: Capitalize the formatted date in tooltip
capitalize-tooltip.tooltip: Check this to capitalize the first letter of the tooltip text.
